When we're dealing with porn the people who view it can be put into a spectrum, specifically three main attributes. There are people who love it, hate it, and those who don't give a fuck and just wanna nut. Again it's a spectrum so a person could dislike some piece of NTR but at the same doesn't really give a shit in the end and vice versa. I'm using this comment section to present my scientific thesis because this one particular NTR is quite well made in the sense that it evokes that NTR feel much more better than other NTR doujin. POV the average porn viewer who most likely has the general vanilla taste, there's a certain extent a person can handle in how much NTR (and other genres) they can handle until it's pure disgust.

This is probably one of my first comments on the site but here we go. I have about 1,300 favorited hentais on this site. Been active since who knows how long. Mabye 4-5 years not sure. I haven't read them all because there are days where i just skim and look at tags and covers and if i like i favorite.  Don't care if its ntr or rape or vanilla or even futanari as long as the art is good and i can just enjoy it. I know its fantasy so i just go with the flow. So if you can't go with the flow just avoid the flow.

Which can be hard considering that ntrs have some of the best artwork I've seen on the site but you can do it. If you want to argue against ntr saying its terrible I'm not saying its not, in reality ntr is terrible but this is fantasy so its fine. Just gotta remember the line between fantasy and reality and we're alll good. 

Thanks for reading and have a good fap.
